options.text: Neural co-ordination is slow and long lived.
Hypothalamus forms the basal part of diencephalon.
Pars distalis is the part of neurohypophysis in pituitary gland.

solution.text:
Hypothalamus lies at the base of the thalamus.
Functions of hypothalamus : 
1. It is centre for body temperature, urge for eating and drinking.
2. It possess several groups of neurosecretory cells which secrete hormones called hypothalamic hormones.
3. Hypothalamus and inner parts of cerebral hemispheres alongwith a group of associated deep structures like amygdala, hippocampus, etc form a complex structure - limbic lobe or limbic system. Limbic system is involved in the regulation of sexual behaviour, expression of emotional reactions (e.g. pleasure, rage excitement and fear) and motivation.
